title: Carrie Bickmore reveals Paulini Curuenavuli was 'her first reality TV crush'
text:
She's the Australian Idol star who was outed as the Spider on Tuesday night's episode of The Masked Singer.

And on Wednesday, Paulini Curuenavuli was doing the media rounds including an appearance on The Project.

But things took a surprising turn in the interview when Carrie Bickmore revealed that the singer was her first reality TV crush.

'Move over Shannon Noll!' Carrie Bickmore (left) left Paulini Curuenavuli (right) stunned as she revealed the singer was 'her first reality TV crush' on Wednesday's episode of The Project

'Well Paulini, you were my first, and this is genuine, my first reality TV crush. Move over Cosima De Vito and Shannon Noll!' Carrie confessed.

She added: 'It was all about Paulini for me all those years ago!'

A surprised Paulini blushed and said: 'Yes! Thank you!'

Surprising! 'Well Paulini, you were my first, and this is genuine, my first reality TV Crush. Move over Cosima De Vito and Shannon Noll!' Carrie said

She wasn't expecting that! A surprised Paulini blushed and said: 'Yes! Thank you!'

'You will always have a spot in my... mask, I was going to stay... in my heart!' Carrie added.

Paulini rose to fame on the first season of Australian Idol, where she came in fourth place.

Guy Sebastian won the season, with Shannon Noll in second place and Cosima De Vito in third.

Throwback! The singer rose to fame on the first season of Australian Idol, where she came in fourth place

On The Masked Singer, Paulini performed an eclectic range of songs by the likes of Britney Spears, AC/DC and The Cranberries.

The judges had no idea who she was until the Spider dropped a hint about The Young Divas, the girl group Paulina used to be a member of.

The Masked Singer Australia resumes on Channel 10 at 7:30pm on Monday.
description: She's the Australian Idol star who was outed as the Spider on Tuesday night's episode of The Masked Singer.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
